tryaviqrvaya#striqShTup CandO# dityaqvAD vayO# viqrAT CandaqH pa~jcA#viqrvayO# gAyaqtrI Canda#strivaqthsO vaya# uqShNihAq Canda# sturyaqvAD vayO#&nuqShTup Canda#H paShThaqvAd vayO# bRuhaqtI Canda# uqkShA vaya#H saqtObRu#hatIq Canda# RuShaqBO vaya#H kaqkucCandO# dhEqnurvayOq jaga#tIq CandO#&naqDvAn. vaya#H paq~gkti SCandO# baqstO vayO# vivaqlaM CandO# vRuqShNirvayO# viSAqlaM CandaqH puru#ShOq vaya# ( ) staqndraM CandO$ vyAqGrO vayO&nA#dhRuShTaqM Canda#H siq(gm)qhO vaya# SCaqndi SCandO# viShTaqBOM ~MvayO&dhi#patiq SCanda#H kShaqtraM ~MvayOq maya#ndaqM CandO# viqSvaka#rmAq vaya#H paramEqShThI CandO# mUqd^^rdhA vaya#H praqjApa#tiq SCanda#H || 10 
(puru#ShOq vayaqH - ShaD vi(gm)#SatiSca) (A5)
